column5: From a peaceful living area, to a large backyard with a swimming pool and fire pit, this spacious family home is ready to be booked! The home is located in Spring, TX, a quaint city in the middle of the Woodlands and Old Town Spring (both a 5 mile distance). The surrounding wooded neighborhood is quiet, yet only a mile away from a grocery store, restaurants, Starbucks, and more! Not to mention, conveniently close access to I45, Hardy toll road & 99/Grand parkway for all your travel needs.
column8: Beautiful and Spacious Home (with a pool!)
